properties.areaDesc: Aiken; Richmond; Columbia; Saluda; Orangeburg; Edgefield
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 3 at 4:37PM EST by NWS Columbia SC
properties.description:
At 437 PM EST...National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a
strong thunderstorm over Augusta, moving northeast at 45 mph.

HAZARD...gusty winds 40 mph.

IMPACT...expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of
light, unsecured objects.

Some locations in the path of this storm include...
Aiken, North Augusta, Aiken Mall, Augusta, Clearwater, Belvedere,
Martinez, New Ellenton, Ridge Spring, Glendale, Edgefield County
Airport, Midtown, Summerville, Daniel Field, Citizens Park, Augusta
Regional Airport, Augusta National Golf Club, USC Aiken, Aiken
Municipal Airport and Gloverville.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 198 and 201.
Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 34.
Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 10 and 15.
Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23.

NWSheadline: Strong Thunderstorms Will Impact Portions of northeastern Richmond...east central Columbia...western Orangeburg...Aiken...south central Saluda and southeastern Edgefield Counties Until 515 PM EST.
